        an Array, containing the split String

      • handleInput

        public static void handleInput(java.lang.Boolean syncTask,

        this method handles the input from the pi
        Parameters:
        syncTask - a Boolean, if this is a synchronised task, used in runSyncTask method
        messages - the new Messages to handle
